item.title: Kubernets Cheat Sheet | Razorops
item.description: Kubernetes is an open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management. It was originally designed by Google, and is now maintained by the Cloud Native Computing Foundation.

item.title: Kubernetes and containers adoption growing fast | Razorops
item.description: Kubernetes and containers adoption growing fast in the last few years. The reason for the relative jump in Kubernetes adoption is because more organizations are starting their container journey with Kubernetes as part of their toolkit.
